Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs and enhance your daily life. With its innovative features and high-quality craftsmanship, this product stands out in its category. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I propose a price of $100 for it. This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, allowing you to experience its benefits risk-free. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to upgrade your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
